remarks: This lemma implements the concept of "equate rational and irrational parts", used to prove many arithmetical properties of the X and Y sequences.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Sep-2014.)
statement: qirropth $p |- ( ( A e. ( CC \ QQ ) /\ ( B e. QQ /\ C e. QQ ) /\ ( D e. QQ /\ E e. QQ ) ) -> ( ( B + ( A x. C ) ) = ( D + ( A x. E ) ) <-> ( B = D /\ C = E ) ) ) $.
